help.tutorialComingSoon: Quick tutorial will be available soon.

guide.title: User Guide
guide.intro: Learn how to use the app effectively to manage your products and prevent waste.
guide.scanDesc: Tap the scan button on the home screen, point the camera at the barcode, and the product will be added automatically.
guide.manualDesc: Tap "Add item without barcode" to enter product details manually.
guide.dateDesc: After scanning or manual entry, select an expiry date using the date picker.
guide.categoriesDesc: Create categories to organize your products. Tap "Categories" in the settings menu.
guide.locationsDesc: Assign products to different locations (e.g., fridge, warehouse) to track them easily.
guide.listsDesc: View all products or only expired products in the "All" and "Expired" tabs.
guide.notificationsDesc: Enable notifications to receive daily reminders before products expire.
guide.reminderDesc: Set how many days in advance to receive an alert. You can choose between 0-30 days.
guide.autoDeleteDesc: Set automatic deletion of expired products after a number of days (1-15 days).
guide.csvDesc: Export all your products to a CSV file for use in Excel or other spreadsheets.
guide.pdfDesc: Create a professional PDF report of all your products with expiry dates and categories.
guide.swipeDesc: Swipe a product left in the list to delete it or mark it as resolved.
guide.refreshDesc: Pull down on the product list to refresh data from the server.
guide.searchDesc: Use the search field to quickly find specific products in the list.
guide.profileDesc: Update your business details, view your subscription, and contact support from the "Settings" screen.

feedback.minLength: Feedback must contain at least 10 characters
feedback.sent: Thank you for your feedback! We'd love to hear from you.
feedback.description: Please share your thoughts, suggestions for improvement, or report issues.
feedback.emailUnavailable: Email app not available. Please contact expiryx5@gmail.com.

privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.heading: Privacy Policy ‚Äì Smart Expiry
privacy.intro: This privacy policy details the manner in which personal information is collected, used, stored, and processed in connection with the use of the Smart Expiry application ("the App"), operated by Oded Chen, a resident of Even Yehuda, Israel ("the Operator", "I").
privacy.intro2: Use of the App constitutes full acceptance of this policy.
privacy.intro3: If you do not agree to the contents hereof, you must refrain from using the App.
privacy.section1Body1: The App may collect information that you choose to provide, including:
privacy.section1Bullet1: Name, email address, and account details
privacy.section1Bullet3: Business data, employees, or additional users
privacy.section1Bullet4: Inventory data, products, expiry dates, barcodes, categories, and notes
privacy.section1Bullet5: Personal information of third parties (e.g., end customers) ‚Äì if and to the extent you choose to enter it
privacy.section1Body2: When using the App, technical information may be collected, including:
privacy.section1Bullet6: Device type, operating system, and app version
privacy.section1Bullet8: Usage data, logs, and crash data
privacy.section2Body1: The information is collected and used for the following purposes:
privacy.section2Bullet1: Operating the App and providing the service
privacy.section2Bullet3: Sending notifications according to user settings
privacy.section2Bullet5: Security, prevention of misuse, and troubleshooting
privacy.section2Bullet6: Improving user experience and system stability
privacy.section3Body1: The user is solely responsible for any information they enter into the App.
privacy.section3Body2: The user declares and undertakes that:
privacy.section3Bullet1: They have a legal right to collect, store, and process the information
privacy.section3Bullet2: The information does not violate any law
privacy.section3Bullet3: The information does not infringe third-party rights
privacy.section3Body3: The Operator is not responsible for the content of the information, its reliability, accuracy, or the results of its use.
privacy.section4Body1: Information may be transferred to technology service providers required solely for operating the App, such as:
privacy.section4Body2: No sale of personal information to third parties is conducted.
privacy.section5Body1: Information may be stored or processed on servers outside Israel.
privacy.section5Body2: There is no commitment that the information will be stored within the State of Israel, but reasonable efforts are made to protect it in accordance with applicable law.
privacy.section6Body1: Reasonable technical and organizational security measures are taken, in accordance with the nature and sensitivity of the information.
privacy.section6Body2: However, absolute security cannot be guaranteed, and the user waives in advance any claim regarding security events that are not under the Operator's control.
privacy.section7Body1: Information is retained as long as the user's account is active.
privacy.section7Body2: After account closure or deletion, information may be retained for a reasonable period for operational purposes, backup, fraud prevention, or compliance with legal requirements.
privacy.section8Body1: The App is permitted for use by all ages.
privacy.section8Body2: If the user is under the age of 13, they declare and undertake that parental or legal guardian consent has been obtained for use of the App and processing of information.
privacy.section8Body3: Responsibility for providing such consent, as well as for collecting, using, and processing personal information of minors, lies solely with the user and/or the parent or guardian.
privacy.section8Body4: If the Operator becomes aware that personal information of a minor has been collected without appropriate consent, it may delete such information upon request.
privacy.section9Bullet1: To access personal information stored about them
privacy.section9Body2: Requests will be examined subject to technical, operational, or legal limitations.
privacy.section10Body1: The Operator may update this privacy policy from time to time.
privacy.section10Body2: Continued use of the App after the policy is updated constitutes acceptance of the updated policy.
privacy.section11Body1: For questions, requests, or inquiries regarding privacy:

permission.title: Camera Permission Required
permission.message: To scan barcodes, please allow camera access.
permission.noAccessMessage: The app needs camera access to scan products
permission.iosTitle: How to enable camera access on iOS:
permission.iosSteps:
1. Tap the "Open Settings" button below
2. Scroll down and select "ExpiryX"
3. Tap "Camera"
4. Select "Allow"
5. Return to the app
permission.androidTitle: How to enable camera access on Android:
permission.androidSteps:
1. Tap the "Open Settings" button below
2. Select "Apps" > "ExpiryX"
3. Go to "Permissions"
4. Tap "Camera" and select "Allow"
5. Return to the app
permission.dialogMessage: To scan barcodes, you need to grant the app camera access.

errors.imageTooLargeError: Image is too large. Try a smaller image or crop it.
errors.functionError: Function returned an error (500). Check function logs in Supabase Dashboard ‚Üí Functions ‚Üí ai-import-table ‚Üí Logs
errors.aiServiceError: AI service error. Check API key and permissions.
errors.invalidResponse: AI returned invalid response. Try another image or ensure the image contains a clear table of products.

fastScan.title: Fast Scan
fastScan.dateInPast: Date cannot be in the past

sharedWithMe.title: Shares sent to me
sharedWithMe.loadError: Couldn't load data. Please try again later.
sharedWithMe.declineMessage: Are you sure you want to decline this invitation?
sharedWithMe.ownerSwitched: Switched to working on this owner's data.
sharedWithMe.needsRefresh: You switched to another account. The app will refresh to load the new data.

welcome.title: Welcome to Smart Expiry!
welcome.body1_start: We want you to experience the app with no compromises, so we're giving you
welcome.body1_highlight: a free month of our PRO subscription
welcome.body2: After your gift month, you can continue using our free plan to manage up to 150 active products. The first products you add will remain unlocked for editing and notifications.

slide1.title: Expiry Management Without the Hassle
slide1.subtitle: The app reminds you before products go to waste

quickDelete.title: Quick Delete Products
quickDelete.loadError: There was a problem loading products
quickDelete.deleteError: There was a problem deleting products
quickDelete.confirmDeleteAllMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete all your products?

This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.
quickDelete.confirmDeleteSelectedMessage:
Are you sure you want to delete %{count} selected products?

This action is irreversible and cannot be undone.

supplierIntake.title: Receive Shipment
supplierIntake.instructionText: Take a photo of the delivery note, invoice, or product list. The system will automatically identify products and barcodes.
supplierIntake.noExpiryNote: Expiry dates will be entered separately after scanning
supplierIntake.quotaExceeded: You've used all your monthly intake pages
supplierIntake.noRemainingPages: No intake pages remaining this month
supplierIntake.noMoreFreePages: No free intake pages remaining. Upgrade to Pro
supplierIntake.keepAppOpen: Please keep the app open during processing. Try again.
supplierIntake.limitMessage: AI analyses are limited on free accounts. Upgrade to Pro for higher volume.
supplierIntake.freeLimitMessage: Intake is limited to 10 pages on free accounts. Upgrade to Pro for higher volume.
supplierIntake.proLimitMessage: You've reached the 20 pages/month limit. Upgrade to Pro+ for higher volume.
supplierIntake.dateChoiceMessage: {count} items added. Enter expiry dates now?
supplierIntake.aiRefusedError: AI refused to process the image. Try a different image.

pendingExpiry.title: Complete Dates
pendingExpiry.limitReached: You've reached the 150 items limit on the free plan. Upgrade to Pro to add more items.
pendingExpiry.deleteAllMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all {count} items?
pendingExpiry.autoDetectedMessage: Some details were auto-detected and may need verification. You can complete or scan barcodes if needed.

statistics.title: Overview
statistics.resetConfirmMessage:
This will reset all statistics data shown on this screen (This Month and All Time).

This action cannot be undone.
statistics.resetMonthConfirmMessage:
Reset this month's statistics only?

This action cannot be undone.
statistics.resetYearConfirmMessage:
Reset this year's statistics?

This action cannot be undone.

offline.savedLocally: Saved locally - will sync when online
